item.title: 分析师称 BBVA 对萨瓦德尔资本公司（Sabadell Capital）的估值过低
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一位分析师称，如果毕尔巴鄂维斯卡亚阿根廷银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）竞购萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）成功，该银行所受的资本打击可能会高于其目前的预期。【原文：The capital hit sustained by Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA if its bid for Banco Sabadell SA is successful will probably be higher than it currently anticipates, according to a Deutsche Bank AG analyst.】

item.title: Eskom 延长煤电厂寿命以保护南非电网
item.description: 南非国有电力公司首席执行官表示，为了避免国家电网 "不堪一击"，该公司需要让一些燃煤电厂的运行时间超过计划的退役期限。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned power utility needs to run some coal-fired plants for longer than their planned retirement deadlines to avoid leaving the national grid “vulnerable,” according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 N26 因反洗钱失职被罚 920 万欧元
item.description: 德国金融监管机构对 N26 Bank AG 罚款 920 万欧元（1000 万美元），因为该机构发现这家金融科技公司在 2022 年迟迟没有提交有关其系统涉嫌洗钱的报告。【原文：Germany’s financial regulator imposed a €9.2 million ($10 million) fine on N26 Bank AG after it found the fintech was delayed in submitting reports on suspected money laundering on its systems in 2022.】

item.title: Ares 预计到 2028 年管理资产将超过 7,500 亿美元
item.description: 战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp）公布了一系列新的财务目标，预计到 2028 年底，该公司管理的资产将增长 75% 以上，超过 7500 亿美元。【原文：Ares Management Corp., unveiling a fresh slate of financial targets, predicted it will boost assets under management more than 75% to surpass $750 billion by the end of 2028.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。市场在波动，美联储官员又要发表一系列讲话，以太币正在成为加密货币的焦点。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. Markets are drifting, there’s another slew of Fed officials speaking and Ether is taking the crypto spotlight. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 专业承包商推动劳氏销售额超预期
item.description: 劳氏公司（Lowe's Cos.）公布的第一季度可比销售额超过了分析师的平均预期，这表明尽管美国房地产市场疲软，但该公司正在向专业承包商进军。【原文：Lowe’s Cos. reported comparable sales for the first quarter that beat the average analyst estimate, a sign that the company is making inroads with professional contractors despite a weak US housing market.】

item.title: 加纳有望赢得国际货币基金组织（IMF）对推迟的欧洲债券改革的祝福
item.description: 由于西非国家的经济增长强于预期，加纳上个月被国际货币基金组织拒绝的 130 亿美元欧洲债券债务重组计划重回正轨。【原文：Ghana’s plan to restructure $13 billion of Eurobond debt rejected last month by the International Monetary Fund is back on track, thanks to stronger-than-expected economic growth in the West African nation.】

item.title: 非洲金融公司可能出售兰特和其他本币债券
item.description: 非洲金融公司（Africa Finance Corp）是一家专注于基础设施建设的开发金融机构，该公司正在考虑发行非洲大陆货币债券，并正在洽谈出售南非兰特证券。【原文：Africa Finance Corp., an infrastructure-focused development finance institution, is considering issuing bonds in currencies from the continent and is in talks to sell securities in South Africa’s rand.】

item.title: 新加坡收入保险公司考虑建立合作伙伴关系或出售股权以帮助拓展亚太地区业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡收入保险有限公司（Income Insurance Ltd.）正在探索在亚太地区扩张的各种选择，包括可能与合作伙伴合作或出售股份。【原文：Singapore’s Income Insurance Ltd. is exploring options as it looks to expand across the Asia Pacific region, including possibly tying up with a partner or selling a stake, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦预计今年经济增长将低于预期目标
item.description: 巴基斯坦预测，截至今年 6 月，其经济将增长 2.38%，低于预算中宣布的 3.5%的目标。【原文：Pakistan forecast its economy will grow 2.38% this year to June, less than the target of 3.5% announced in the budget.】

item.title: 俄罗斯小麦产量预估一个月内下降 10%，助推涨势
item.description: 由于种植区遭遇反常的寒冷天气，本月俄罗斯下一季农作物收成预期再次下调，对供应紧张的担忧给期货市场增添了压力。【原文：Estimates for Russia’s next crop harvest have been slashed again this month as unseasonably cold weather hit growing regions, and concern over tighter supplies is adding pressure to the futures market.】

item.title: 沙特股市自大流行病以来首次落后于新兴股市
item.description: 随着中东紧张局势加剧以及沙特王国缩减了一个庞大的沙漠建设项目的计划，沙特股市自大流行病以来首次落后于新兴市场同行。【原文：Saudi stocks are lagging emerging-market peers for the first time since the pandemic as tensions in the Middle East mount and the kingdom dials down plans for a sprawling desert construction project.】

item.title: 前瑞银交易员汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）被英国最高法院拒之门外
item.description: 汤姆-海耶斯（Tom Hayes）是前明星交易员，也是 Libor 丑闻的代言人，他在对自己近十年的刑事定罪提出上诉的第一次申请中败诉，但他获得了一些希望，可以直接向英国最高法院提出上诉。【原文：Tom Hayes, the former star trader who became the face of the Libor scandal, lost a first bid to appeal his near decade-old criminal conviction but was given some hope that he could go directly to the UK’s highest court.】

item.title: Assura 与 USS 合作开发英国国家医疗服务系统社区卫生大楼
item.description: 英国房地产开发商 Assura Plc 正在与 Universities Superannuation Scheme Ltd.组建一家价值 2.5 亿英镑（3.18 亿美元）的合资企业，旨在促进对国家卫生服务基础设施的投资。【原文：UK property developer Assura Plc is forming a £250 million ($318 million) joint venture with Universities Superannuation Scheme Ltd. aimed at boosting investment in National Health Service infrastructure.】

item.title: 高盛称股票投资者为波动性卷土重来做好准备
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Stock investors are bracing for a spike in market volatility, and upcoming events such as Nvidia Corp.’s earnings report can exacerbate any moves, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 土耳其 Koc 公司称 Yapi Kredi 出售谈判处于初步阶段
item.description: 土耳其企业集团 Koc Holding 在媒体报道后表示，正在就出售其贷款机构 Yapi ve Kredi Bankasi AS 进行早期讨论。【原文：Turkish conglomerate Koc Holding said it is in early discussions regarding the sale of its lender Yapi ve Kredi Bankasi AS, following reports in the media.】

item.title: Stripe 在伦敦金融城设立办事处，加大在英国的扩张力度
item.description: Stripe Inc. 将在伦敦金融城开设一个新办事处，以扩大其在英国的业务并向小型企业提供贷款。【原文：Stripe Inc. is opening a new office in the City of London as it looks expand its UK operations and roll out lending to small businesses.】

item.title: 世界快速老龄化对投资的意义
item.description:
越来越多的理财经理表示，现在是时候让投资组合为人口的 转变做好准备了

。【原文：

A growing number of money managers say it’s time to get portfolios ready for a population shift

item.title: 印度发布高温警报后警告未来天气将更炎热
item.description: 随着致命的高温炙烤印度北部部分地区，印度发布了最高级别的天气警报，并警告未来天气将更加炎热。【原文：India has issued its highest weather alerts and warned of hotter conditions ahead as deadly heat scorches parts of the nation’s north.】

item.title: Vapes、Snus 和其他 "无烟 "尼古丁产品有什么问题？
item.description: 随着全球吸烟率的下降，一些国家甚至试图禁止吸烟，烟草公司找到了其他赚钱的方法，满足人们对尼古丁的渴望，尼古丁是烟草中令人上瘾的兴奋剂。无烟 "尼古丁产品的销量正在蚕食香烟和其他可燃物的销量。然而，卫生官员在是否应该纵容这些产品的问题上存在分歧。虽然尼古丁产品的致命性低于香烟，但它们同样容易让使用者上瘾，而且还可能对人体有害。【原文：As rates of smoking decline worldwide, and some countries even try to ban it, tobacco companies have found other ways to make money by satisfying people’s hankering for nicotine, the addictive stimulant found in tobacco. Sales of “smoke-free” nicotine products are eating into those of cigarettes and other combustibles. Yet health officials are divided as to whether they should condone these products. While less deadly than cigarettes, they can hook users just as easily and may also have harmful】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司肯布尔债券创下新低，因为董事会清空了债券
item.description: 英国水务公司泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd.）的母公司陷入困境，在 6 月 12 日的关键裁决前，该公司一大批董事退出董事会，导致其债务骤降至新低。【原文：The parent company of struggling British water utility Thames Water Ltd. saw its debt plummet to new lows after a wave of directors quit the board ahead of a crucial June 12 ruling.】

item.title: 中国批准礼来减肥药上市，但目前仅用于糖尿病治疗
item.description: 中国为礼来公司的大片药物替扎帕肽治疗糖尿病开了绿灯，此举将加剧这家制药商与诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在全球第二大减肥药市场上的竞争。【原文：China gave the greenlight to Eli Lilly & Co.’s blockbuster drug tirzepatide for use in treating diabetes, a move that will intensify the drugmaker’s rivalry with Novo Nordisk A/S over weight-loss drugs in the world’s second-largest market.】

item.title: 印度罕见地要求炼油商加入俄罗斯石油交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度已罕见地要求其国营炼油厂和私营加工商信实工业有限公司与俄罗斯联合谈判一项长期供应协议。【原文：India has made a rare request to its state-run oil refiners and private processor Reliance Industries Ltd. to jointly negotiate a long-term supply deal with Russia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行押注欧洲股权销售，同时在首次公开募股领域处于领先地位
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）正寻求在欧洲建立其股票资本市场专营权，即使在今年参与该地区一些最大的首次公开募股时，任何交易都不会太小。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is looking to build out its equity capital markets franchise in Europe, and even as it works on some of the region’s largest initial public offerings this year, no deal is too small.】

item.title: 凯雷为最大的日本收购基金融资 28 亿美元
item.description: 尽管全球私募股权公司的筹资环境黯淡，凯雷集团公司（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. raised 430 billion yen ($2.8 billion) for its fifth Japan buyout fund, adding to signs of investor interest in the country despite a gloomy fundraising climate for private equity firms globally.】

item.title: 风险较高的日元债券保持强劲势头，收益率有望走高
item.description: 日元企业债券的强劲势头表明，市场对风险较高、期限较短、不易受加息影响的债券有很好的胃口。【原文：A strong pipeline of yen corporate bonds suggests there’s good appetite for riskier bonds with shorter tenors that are less vulnerable to interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 激进派 Cevian 持股 Baloise，加倍看好瑞士金融业
item.description: 激进基金 Cevian Capital AB 成为 Baloise Holding AG 的主要股东，这是继最近入股瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）之后，该基金在瑞士金融业的第二大投资。【原文：Activist fund Cevian Capital AB became a major shareholder in Baloise Holding AG, marking its second big investment in the Swiss finance industry after recently taking a stake in UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 西班牙顶级金融控股公司将增持西班牙电信股份
item.description: 西班牙最大的金融控股公司 CriteriaCaixa SA 正寻求将其在西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）的股份增至 10%，以配合西班牙政府的立场。【原文：CriteriaCaixa SA, Spain’s biggest financial holding company, is seeking to increase its stake in Telefonica SA to 10%, matching the Spanish government’s position.】

item.title: 海军恢复演习，油轮再次被迫驶离希腊湾
item.description: 在当地海军再次发出将在该地区进行演习的通知后，少数进入希腊南部海域转运俄罗斯石油的油轮被迫再次离开。【原文：A handful of oil tankers that had entered the waters off southern Greece to transfer Russian petroleum were forced to depart again after the local navy re-issued a notice that it would carry out exercises in the area.】

item.title: 印度 6 万亿美元衍生品狂潮令政府忧心忡忡
item.description: 印度股票衍生品交易量飙升至全球最高水平，这引发了国家政策制定者的担忧，即这种狂热可能会损害将家庭储蓄用于生产目的的努力。【原文：The surge in Indian equity derivatives that’s driven up volumes to the highest in the world is spurring concern among the nation’s policymakers that the frenzy may hurt efforts to harness household savings for productive purposes.】
